name: Riding Fight
overview:
Riding Fight is a futuristic crime themed auto move beat 'em-up game that puts the player in the shoes of the bounty hunters Burn Bowie (player 1) or Keith Jager (player 2) that take on a criminal organization called Death Serpent.

While riding a hover board the player has to beat-up other hover boarders that fight with their bare hands or a weapons, futuristic vehicles and bosses. You fight the enemies with hand to hand moves and kicks. Weapons from defeated enemies can be used to beat-up other enemies and health can be replenished. The game can be played solo or with a friend.
